import { useState } from "react"; export default function CreateCard() { const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(""); const [aboutMe, setAboutme] = useState(""); const [html, setHTML] = useState("") return (

Create Your DevCard

setFullName(e.target.value) } type="text" placeholder="Your Full Name" /> setAboutme(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="About me"/>

Technologies you Know:

setHTML(e.target.value)} type="checkbox" name="HTML"/>

Fullname: {fullName}

About me: {aboutMe}

); }
